description: Place a new order

(null if dropoffID Provided) The ID of Selected Address

List of waste items in the order with their details

description: Retrieve the list of addresses associated with the customer

parameters.paramDescription: The unique identifier of the customer

responseParameters.paramDescription: The unique identifier of the Address
The Zone of Which side of the City the Customer is at
The address to be added as Text

description: Add a new address for the customer

parameters.paramDescription: The unique identifier of the customer
The Name of the Address Like Home, Work, etc.
The City of the Customer
The Zone of Which side of the City the Customer is at
The address to be added as Text
(Optional) The latitude of the address location
(Optional) The longitude of the address location
(Optional) The type of address, e.g., home, work
(Optional) The building number of the address
(Optional) The floor number of the address
(Optional) The apartment number of the address

responseDescription: Confirms that the address has been added

description: Edit an existing address for the customer

parameters.paramDescription: The unique identifier of the customer
The unique identifier of the address to be edited
The Name of the Address Like Home, Work, etc.
The City of the Customer
The Zone of Which side of the City the Customer is at
The address to be added as Text
(Optional) The latitude of the address location
(Optional) The longitude of the address location
(Optional) The type of address, e.g., home, work
(Optional) The building number of the address
(Optional) The floor number of the address
(Optional) The apartment number of the address

responseDescription: Confirms that the address has been Edited
